mapper.select: SELECT NATION_CODE, NATION_NAME_KR, NATION_NAME_EN FROM NetMiner.NATION_CODE;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(A.START_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H') as START_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(A.END_DATE,'%m-%d %H') AS END_DATE, A.STATS_YN, A.END_DATE_YN, A.COMMENT_KR, A.COMMENT_EN FROM NetMiner.CHECK_START_END_TIME A WHERE NO = (SELECT MAX(NO) FROM NetMiner.CHECK_START_END_TIME) AND NOW() BETWEEN START_DATE AND END_DATE;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NetMiner.CHECK_SEND_AUTH_MAIL_LOG ( EMAIL_CODE, USER_ID , SEND_DATE, END_DATE, AUTH_CODE, REG_DATE ) SELECT #{emailCode} AS EMAIL_CODE , #{userId} AS USER_ID , NOW() AS SEND_DATE , DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 MINUTE) AS END_DATE , #{randomNumber} AS AUTH_CODE , NOW() AS REG_DATE ;
